item.title: Ilhan Omar defends MEALS Act despite ties to massive Minnesota fraud scheme
item.description: Rep. Ilhan Omar, D-Minn., defended her MEALS Act despite its connection to Minnesota's $250 million "Feeding Our Future" alleged fraud scheme.

item.title: Judge tosses Trump-linked lawsuit targeting Chief Justice Roberts, dealing setback to Trump allies

item.title: 134 House Republicans demand 'assurances' before US eases Syria sanctions
item.description: More than 100 House Republicans demand oversight of Syria as U.S. prepares to repeal sanctions, warning of potential reversal if progress falters.
